item.title: Flutes, Flights and Fire-Breathing Dragons
item.author: Lorenzo Silvestri,Rachel Wilson,
item.description: Dragons, lakes, and music. These three words defined the event of the summer that everyone in IC Wind Band had been looking forward to. This year, Wind Band went further than we’ve ever ventured before, touring in the (mostly) sunny land of Slovenia. Slovenia’s capital city, Ljubljana, was a welcome …
